Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1165.jpg'}
{3: 'Less than ten minutes after the third round ended, Faulkner, Rabio, and Eleanor confirmed their selections for the next round in sequence.'}
{3: 'Then Collins.'}
{3: 'The ten-second countdown appears on the screen of your terminal. If you do not make a choice now, you will be defeated.'}
{3: "Faulkner and Rabio's sudden shift in attitude has pushed things toward chaos. They're already pushing to move the game into the next round."}
{2: '(Choose rock)', 3: '8', 4: '(Choose scissors)', 5: '8', 6: '(Leave it to instinct)', 7: '8'}
{3: 'The result is submitted immediately.'}
{1: 'Result of this round: No. 3 and No. 4 are defeated.', 3: '50', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: 'Result of this round: No. 3 and No. 4 are defeated.'}
{3: 'You inject yourself with the serum before the red on the screen can fully sear your vision.'}
{3: 'The concentration indicator on the screen suddenly jumps to the third space.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory895.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Lilith sits in a leather chair with her feet propped up on another undamaged chair.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Things are getting a bit stale...', 4: '1', 18: '100007503'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Deception, betrayal... such a played-out aesthetic, Aunt.', 4: '1', 18: '100007504'}
{3: 'She breaks open a fortune cookie and takes out the well-preserved slip of paper from inside.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Thought something different might happen, but they're just left hoping for a lucky break.", 4: '1', 18: '100007506'}
{3: "Lilith taps a card on the terminal screen. She doesn't even properly look at the available options."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1165.jpg'}
{1: 'Result of this round: No. 5 is defeated.', 3: '50', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: 'Result of this round: No. 5 is defeated.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Speaking of which, Mr. Collins and Mr. Rabio have had some really good luck these past two rounds...', 4: '18', 18: '100007507'}
{3: "Eleanor's voice comes through the terminal as she speaks over the public channel."}
{3: "Meanwhile, the Punishing Virus concentration indicator on the screen flashes a warning. Danger is closing in. If the levels rise any higher, they'll breach the protective suits' limits."}
{3: "Collins and Rabio's card plays are perfectly identical—a pattern that might explain their winning streak."}
{3: 'But Collins has no reason to cooperate with Rabio.'}
{2: '(Pick up the terminal)', 3: '48'}
{3: 'As stated at the beginning of the broadcast, players can participate in the game without wearing terminals.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1167.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After the gunshot rang out, the bullet likely hit the mechanoid who called himself Collins.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab'}
{3: "This suggests one thing: the rooms aren't completely isolated from each other."}
{3: "And if that's the case, the killer would only need to take Collins' terminal to impersonate him and carry out his previous operations."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1165.jpg'}
{2: '(To find a way out...)', 3: '66'}
{2: '(The three remaining survivors must stay in contact.)', 3: '67'}
{1: '1', 3: 'And the sources of help available are a sensitive, easily angered rogue Construct and a mysterious lady of unknown background.'}
{2: "(As you thought, you can't leave risks to uncertainty.)", 3: '74'}
{2: "(Connect to Faulkner's private channel)", 3: '75'}
{3: "As expected, there's no response."}
{2: 'Making hasty choices would only make things worse.', 3: '79'}
{2: 'Collins and Rabio have been consistently choosing the same time options for several rounds.', 3: '80'}
{2: "It's clear now: they must know each other's moves in advance.", 3: '81'}
{2: 'No matter what method they use.', 3: '82'}
{3: 'Still silence.'}
{3: 'Based on his past behavior, he should have made his decision by now. But this time, he hesitates.'}
{3: 'Seizing the opportunity during this brief pause, Eleanor takes the initiative and submits her choices for the round ahead of him.'}
{2: 'Consider the real purpose behind the private channels they set up.', 3: '86'}
{3: 'To sow distrust. To encourage conspiracy. To pit players against one another in a web of attacks and betrayal.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1174.jpg'}
{3: 'The Construct surveys the devastated room interior, the terminal carelessly tossed into a corner.'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Player No. 4"', 3: 'My draw for this round is scissors and paper.', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Faulkner feels utterly exhausted, both physically and mentally. But beneath the fatigue, a sharp, burning anger begins to take hold.'}
{3: 'The virus is already eating away at his mind.'}
{3: '"This can\'t go on," he thinks, forcing himself to stay calm.'}
{3: 'The voice from the other end of the terminal helps Faulkner regain some composure. He stands up.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1165.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "Those who have already made their choices can't receive private communications. Eleanor will likely have to wait until the next round to make contact."}
{3: 'After Faulkner makes his choice, you make yours as well.'}
{3: 'The results begin to unfold.'}
{1: 'Result of this round: No. 1 and No. 2 are defeated.', 3: '50', 4: 'ff4e4eff'}
{3: 'Result of this round: No. 1 and No. 2 are defeated.'}
{3: "Eleanor's choice aligned with mine and Faulkner's—maybe by luck, maybe not. Either way, it led to Rabio and Collins' defeat."}
{3: 'The filtering device, whose operational sounds had become nearly inaudible, begins to hum once more. The Punishing concentration decreases accordingly.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1174.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Rabio gently pushes the door open, slipping silently out of the ventilation duct and landing softly on the floor.'}
{3: "Stepping into a room with an even higher concentration of the virus fills him with a pang of regret, but he can't afford to let the remaining enemies on the field form an alliance."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Faulkner', 3: "Prepare your last words, Kurono's lapdog.", 4: '18', 18: '100007511'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront17.png', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1145.jpg'}
{2: 'What did you just say?', 3: '150'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Faulkner', 3: 'What are you playing this round?', 4: '18', 5: '3', 18: '100007512'}
{2: 'Rock and scissors.', 3: '153'}
{2: 'To be fair, I should also know what options you received.', 3: '155'}
{2: 'Faulkner, trust goes both ways.', 3: '157'}
{3: "Too much of a Mr. Goody-Two-Shoes—out of all the nonsense Rabio has spouted, it's the only thing Faulkner agrees with."}
{1: '9', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=30>No. 4: Rock</size></color>', 3: '600', 9: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1165.jpg'}
{3: "Before the results even appear, you've already strapped the terminal back onto your hand."}
{3: 'Starting with the most unstable factors is definitely too risky.'}
{3: "But then again, from every other angle, you can't get a read on Eleanor. She never shows a hint of emotion, making it impossible to figure out where she stands."}
{3: 'Your eyes scan the dazzling colors in the results column, just as the hum of the filtration device nearby cuts out again.'}

{3: 'As the device ceases operation, the Punishing concentration in the room begins to rise. On the terminal, the indicator gradually spreads from light green at the far end, approaching the X-shaped endpoint.'}
{2: "But it's not the time to give up yet...", 3: '190'}
{3: 'The process of adjusting the descending walls is designed to keep everyone isolated, ensuring no one can collaborate or interfere.'}
{3: "With randomly assigned participant positions... this device couldn't possibly create perfect divisions."}
{3: "If the game's goal was simply to weed out the lucky, they wouldn't have built it with such intricate mechanisms."}
{3: ' The designers likely left this loophole open on purpose, maybe even encouraging the participants to exploit it.'}
{3: 'More importantly, your opponents have most likely already done the same.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1168.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1168.jpg'}
{3: 'And so, you finally return once more to the entrance gate damaged by the collapsed wall.'}
{3: 'Pushing aside the debris piled atop the twice-damaged ruins, you find a gap just wide enough for one person to squeeze through.'}
{3: 'After a quick check of the Standard Pistol, you slide it into your waistband. Then, you grab your combat knife and slice off every Babylonia emblem and identifying mark from your clothes.'}
{3: 'Better not to reveal too many clues about identity before confirming what the other party knows.'}
{3: 'Shredded fabric litters the floor. The helmet of the protective suit is covered with numerous scratches. The final step is to inject the Serum.'}
{2: 'Now only one choice left...', 3: '206', 4: "It's to embrace uncertainty and take the risk.", 5: '206'}
{3: 'Stepping forward, you notice the Punishing concentration rising steadily on the terminal display.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1165.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: 'If we lose this round, the Punishing Virus concentration in the room...', 4: '1', 18: '100007516'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Ordinary humans probably won't survive, right?", 4: '1', 18: '100007517'}
{3: 'Lilith sits at a card table, utterly bored, and picks up her terminal.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Still kicking, Mr. Goody-Two-Shoes?', 4: '1', 18: '100007518'}
{2: "I'm alive and well.", 3: '218'}
{3: "Lilith hears the voice, but it's not coming from the terminal in her hand."}
{3: 'She looks toward the ruins where a figure in a standard protective suit appears before her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: "So, you've decided to go full beast mode after all.", 4: '1', 18: '100007519'}
{3: 'She maintains her enigmatic smile.'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Should I be surprised you managed to cross over from another room, or should I say I was expecting you?', 4: '1', 18: '100007520'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "So, these rooms aren't completely isolated.", 4: '1', 18: '100007521'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'By paying a certain price—like you did—you can reach other areas.', 4: '1', 18: '100007522'}
{2: '(Do not respond)', 3: '231'}
{3: 'You, who are in a protective suit, approach Lilith.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: "I saw the results from earlier. You tried to reach out to Mr. Faulkner, didn't you?", 4: '1', 18: '100007523'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'Too bad he changed his tune so quickly.', 4: '1', 18: '100007524'}
{2: 'Perhaps he has his own plans.', 3: '239', 4: '(Remain silent)', 5: '241'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: "Now's not the time for sentimentality.", 4: '1', 18: '100007525'}
{3: 'You continue walking forward. On the terminal strapped to your arm, the Punishing Virus concentration has reached an alarmingly high level.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilith', 3: "Speaking of which, you didn't come here for chit-chat, did you?", 4: '1', 18: '100007526'}
{2: 'The outcome of the last round made one thing crystal clear:', 3: '251'}
{2: 'If only you have realized earlier that Rabio and Collins had already formed an alliance...', 3: '252'}
{2: 'And now, it seems this alliance has grown to three.', 3: '253'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'You seem awfully confident about that.', 4: '1', 18: '100007527'}
{2: "I've already been in contact with Faulkner.", 3: '256'}
{2: 'He has no reason to betray me...', 3: '257'}
{2: 'Unless he has already contacted Rabio.', 3: '258'}
{3: "Lilith gauges the distance between you and herself, suspecting that you're doing the same."}
{2: 'I told you we should have evacuated as many people as possible.', 3: '260'}
{2: "Even though now you're the only one left standing with me.", 3: '261'}
{3: 'The next two sentences bring that satisfied smile back to her face.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0.4'}
{3: 'Could it be that the hunter is carefully disguising themselves, biding their time for the perfect moment to strike?'}
{3: 'So then, how long does the hunter plan to keep hiding their true intentions?'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0', 5: '0.4'}
{2: 'Lilith', 3: 'But how are you going to prove you can deliver?', 4: '1', 18: '100007528'}
